text: A new #COVID19 vaccine may not only protect you from producing #antibodies to combat SARS-CoV-2, but possibly train your immune system to recognize up to 8 variants with 1 shot. Check out this blog post from @NIHDirector to learn more about the #vaccine ➡️ https://t.co/GPnPFlKhgl https://t.co/tmeSApPE1b
